TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but the Dark Forest Theory is real and aliens destroy you and the system as soon as you exit.

I wish for Act 8 of Homestuck

Edited December 1, 2017 by Nailed it!
Ortography
Granted, but when your interstellar ship docks with your refueling station in LKO the Kraken hits you and sends your precious station to 666 666 Ym.

Granted. However, it's hard to guess, so hmm, how about... An unlimited supply of 0 pickles.

I wish to know all the maths.

Granted, but Abbot and Costello teach you the math. (Like if you get this reference)

I wish the whole MLP franchise vanished from the universe without a trace.

Granted. MLP gets replaced with NMBSCH - Not My Big and Smelly Cart Horses.

Before MLP disappears, I wish they replace Pinkie Pie with another type of Excel diagram.

Edited December 2, 2017 by kerbiloid
Granted but they revert it after changing. I wish Jeb had more G-load resistance
Granted, but every other Kerbal passes out at 1.1 G.

Granted. You got nothing.

I wish for the forum to be active during the day, and not during the night.

Granted, but it's someone else's day and night. And it's going to be night for another three years.

I wish for temporal shenanigans.

Edited December 7, 2017 by 0111narwhalz

Granted. But it's so overwhelming, you can't ever figure it out. http://mspaintadventures.wikia.com/wiki/Time_shenanigans

I wish for school to be over already.

Granted. They throw you into the school dungeon and lock the door. Now the school is already over you.

I wish it stops snowing and we'll again have the lovely gray asphalt next morning.

Granted. However, the government has painted all the roads blue, so it's no longer gray.

I wish for a 3rd Homestuck reference.

Granted But then they edit their post before you see it. All records are erased. 

I wish that more people would ridicule flat earth idiots...

Granted. They’re ridiculised but gain more popularity because of that.

 

I wish for irons in the fire

Granted.
You join a golf club and accidentally drop a burning match on the carpet.
Irons are in the fire.

I wish to finish my lunch and return to the work.

Edited December 8, 2017 by kerbiloid

Granted. You finish eating your lunch that has been poisoned with Botulinum toxin. Now you're dead forever!

I with literally would mean figuratively.

So granted. Now firefighters help only figuratively and people die. Yay!

I wish I was a pilot who can't crash.

Granted, but everyone else now crashes with a 100% chance. And you aren't in the cockpit for this flight...

I wish that homework was abolished.

Granted. You now get 3 times the work to do at work/school.

 

I wish for negative gravity

Granted newtons cannonball now hits you because everything falls out of orbit.

i wish for a kerbin.

Granted, but your Kerbin is reparented and the KSC view is glitchy.

I wish for the finest pizza.

Edited December 13, 2017 by Gyrfalcon5

Granted, but before you can take a bite you get shot by the pizza police because your pizza was illegally obtained.

I wish that I was on the ISS

Granted. You are live from the ISS while it's deorbiting.

22 hours ago, Gyrfalcon5 said:

I wish for the finest pizza.

Granted, too. But the pizza looks so fine that you can't have yourself to begin eating. So, the finest pizza gets stale, and you drop it into the trashcan still untouched.

 

I wish ISS could use International maritime signal flags. At least as a KSP mod.

Spoiler

Granted however i miss a bracket

I wish for a custom planet

Granted, but it's near impossible to land on due to 20g surface gravity and no atmosphere.

I wish for a Tesla Roadster.

Edited December 14, 2017 by 15Redstones
